page.title: 14GHOSTS OF PEBMARSH
page.content: It is said that there is a ghost at{ {Hanamunk Hill}which is between Pebmarsh and Countess Cross.A monk and a nun have been seen running across the fields.Some people say that the monk has a knife in his hand. A ghost has also been seen on the way to{Alphamstone.}When car lights shine on a puddle on the road,it is said that a monk can be seen carrying a nun's head on a silver plate. An{ancient chapel}used to stand next to the Manor House which is now a dwelling and the Post Office.Some people say that a tunnel leading from the old Manor House towards the church is haunted.
